"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor - This song would be perfect for when I'm feeling energized and ready to take on any challenge that comes my way.
"Hakuna Matata" from The Lion King - When things get tough, this upbeat song reminds me to live in the moment and not worry about the future or past.
"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey - Whenever I feel like giving up, this classic rock anthem inspires me to keep going and never lose faith in myself.
"Ain't No Mountain High Enough" by Marvin Gaye and Tammi Terrell - This soulful duet reminds me that anything is possible if I work hard enough and never give up on my dreams.
"Happy" by Pharrell Williams - When I need a pick-me-up, this catchy pop song always puts a smile on my face and helps me find joy in the little things.
